reviewtext: I have had two Radio Shack players--which didn't  hold up, unfortunately, so I thought the Panasonic would be better and I expected the same features, i.e.  one called "aux" which I use to connect my radio with a cable to the tape recorder and can tape off programs.  It did not come with that feature so it is not useful for my main purpose. It has a spot for a microphone, but that was not provided.  I didn't care about that anyway.
